channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I received an inheritance from my father’s estate, but the executor wants me to give it back. What should I do?
item.description: “The attorney for my late father stated that all beneficiaries needed to wait 10 months before disbursements from the sale of the home could be releas...

item.title: ‘I fear a significant decline in the S&P 500’: Do I sell my tech stocks before it’s too late?
item.description: Analysts are closely watching Trump’s tariff negotiations, the labor market, the Fed and inflation, but they are stymied by delayed economic data.

item.title: ‘Luckily, I did not mix our finances’: My husband is 7 years younger and has dementia. What happens now?
item.description: “I have gotten our living expenses as low as I can, and I have dental and healthcare insurance for both of us.”

item.title: Trump could give automakers relief from Nexperia chip shortage with China deal
item.description: The White House and the Chinese government have reached an agreement to resume chip shipments from semiconductor company Nexperia, according to the Wa...

item.title: I’m planning to retire at 65 when my twins are 15. How will this impact their healthcare coverage?
item.description: “By retiring when they are in the 10th grade my income will be low when they apply for college scholarships.”

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.
